title: Venetian Blind Cleaner Brush – Wet & Dry Microfiber Duster with Ergonomic Handle by KOKSI – Washable Cleaning Tool for Shades & Blinds

Dual Cleaning Modes: Use the damp duster sponge for wet cleaning and the dry brush for dusting, making it one of the good venetian blind cleaner tools available. This dual functionality ensures a thorough cleaning for all your blinds and shutters

Ideal for Home Cleaning: This versatile cleaning tool is perfect for home cleaning, making it easy to maintain your blinds, curtains, and shutters. Itâ€s a must-have among cleaning gadgets for home, ensuring your space remains dust-free and fresh

It comes with five machine-washable sleeves. this handy brush is essential for keeping your blinds in the best possible condition. Using microfibre technology, this clever Microfibre Venetian Blind Brush is ideal for ensuring your blinds are kept in pristine condition with minimum effort. With its microfibre sleeves, this brush snaffles dust at speed from both horizontal and vertical blinds with no cleaning sprays or polishes needed – just one simple swipe of the brush. It can be used dry to dust blinds, or wet to clean them, giving you extra versatility. When blinds are left neglected, they can become soiled with dust, pet fur, and all the other skin cells and dander that float around the home. Fortunately, cleaning blinds isn’t that difficult of a task with the microfiber mini blind duster. Coming with five machine-washable sleeves, this handy brush is essential for keeping your blinds in the best possible condition.
